languages.text: "Хе. С персоналом зря стараешься. Если их собеседник будет поджаривать им пятки во время разговора, все пароли быстро будут разглашены."
"Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."
languages.original_text: "Хе. С персоналом зря стараешься. Если их собеседник будет поджаривать им пятки во время разговора, все пароли быстро будут разглашены."

traits.locale_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “呵，这又有什么用呢？等到火在那些人脚下烧起来的时候，他们用不了多久，就会把所有密码一五一十地全盘托出。”
languages.original_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."

traits.locale_text: “呵，这又有什么用呢？等到火在那些人脚下烧起来的时候，他们用不了多久，就会把所有密码一五一十地全盘托出。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Bah... À quoi bon ? Quand les flammes viendront leur lécher les pieds, croyez-moi, ils cracheront tous les mots de passe qu'ils connaissent en moins de deux. »
languages.original_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."

traits.locale_text: « Bah... À quoi bon ? Quand les flammes viendront leur lécher les pieds, croyez-moi, ils cracheront tous les mots de passe qu'ils connaissent en moins de deux. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ha. Das wird herzlich wenig helfen. Wenn die Flammen an ihren Füßen züngeln, wird es nicht lange dauern, bis die Passwörter aus ihnen herauspurzeln."
languages.original_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."

traits.locale_text: "Ha. Das wird herzlich wenig helfen. Wenn die Flammen an ihren Füßen züngeln, wird es nicht lange dauern, bis die Passwörter aus ihnen herauspurzeln."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「へえ。それはいいことね。炎が彼らの足を舐めたら、パスワードがこぼれ落ちてくるんじゃないかな」
languages.original_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."

traits.locale_text: 「へえ。それはいいことね。炎が彼らの足を舐めたら、パスワードがこぼれ落ちてくるんじゃないかな」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ja, como si fuera a servir de algo. En cuanto entren un poco en calor, dejarán escapar sus secretos en un abrir y cerrar de ojos».
languages.original_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."

traits.locale_text: «Ja, como si fuera a servir de algo. En cuanto entren un poco en calor, dejarán escapar sus secretos en un abrir y cerrar de ojos».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Heh. Bunlar bayağı işimize yarar. Alevler ayaklarını okşasın, o zaman tek tek tüm şifreleri dökülecekler."
languages.original_text: "Heh. Fat lot of good that will do. When the flames are licking at their feet, it won't be long before all the passwords come spilling out of them."
